TITLE_CONTRACT.P: National Framework Agreement for Furniture Supplies, Installation and Associated Products

TOTAL_QUANTITY_OR_SCOPE.P: Furniture Supplies, Installation and Associated products. Precise quantities are currently unknown. It is anticipated that initial expenditure will be in the region of 100 000 GBP to 2 000 000 GBP in the first year of this framework agreement however this is approximate only and the values may vary depending on the requirements of those bodies purchasing under the framework agreement.

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: — Screens desk top and floor mounted.

TOTAL_QUANTITY_OR_SCOPE.P: Precise quantities are unknown. It is anticipated that initial expenditure will be in the region of 10 000 GBP to 200 000 GBP in the first year of this framework agreement, however this is approximate only and the values may vary depending on the requirements of those bodies purchasing under the framework agreement. The estimated value over the total framework agreement term (including any extension Options), are based on that initial expenditure. An estimated annual value between 12 500 GBP to 250 000 GBP over a (3 + 1 year term) = 50 000 GBP to 1 000 000 GBP

ADDITIONAL_INFORMATION.P: The purpose of this notice is to draw attention to a procurement that Added Value Portal t/a PAGABO (PAGABO) intends to commence, on behalf of South Hunsley Secondary School and Sixth Form during the subsequent 12 months. The invitation to tender will be the subject of a separate notice and it is that notice to which potential suppliers will need to respond at the appropriate time.

PAGABO expects to provide successful Suppliers with the opportunity to offer additional savings to customers through the provision of discounted pricing, value added offerings and commitment/bulk buy initiatives. The FWA will be between South Hunsley Secondary School and Sixth Form and the Supplier.

Whilst it is anticipated that initial expenditure under any forthcoming procurement will be in the region of 500 000 GBP to 10 00 000 GBP for this contract award, this is approximate only and the values will be to such level as those purchasing under the framework agreement consider necessary to provide suitable requirements.

Whilst the framework agreement will be between South Hunsley Secondary School and Sixth Form and the Supplier, however the following entities will be able to enter into a direct contract with the Supplier for any of the supplies and/or services under the Framework.
1) South Hunsley Secondary School and Sixth Form
5) any government department, agency or other statutory body (for the avoidance of doubt including local authorities and housing associations).
Any awarded Supplier will be required to report to and pay a direct contract management fee to PAGABO as detailed in the tender documents.

PAGABO is currently considering the use of lots for this procurement. However, it reserves the right not to as part of any future tender process. Further information in respect of the lot strategy will be set out in the notice for the forthcoming procurement. As part of its pre-tender strategy PAGABO anticipates holding pre-tender meetings with suppliers during Q2 2018.
If you wish to register an expression of interest in this tender and to be informed of any pre-tender meetings, then please contact The Contract Manager — info@pagabo.co.uk
